April 29, 2017, Ian managed Dave directly

Dave is a seasoned Senior Art Director with experience in every area of creative, including digital, video, social, print, OOH, and design. On top of all that he's a true team player which, combined with all his creative skill sets is rare in our industry. Agency heads: If you're looking for someone who can hit the ground running, Dave is your man. I'd also gladly speak with you personally, if you're in search of someone like Dave.

Gabe Dorosz
Freelance Brand Strategist | Group Strategy Director
February 19, 2015, Ian was senior to Gabe but didn’t manage directly

I worked with Gabe on several projects when he was at C-K. Gabe is much more than a Digital Strategist, he's a big thinker. He's able to look at a problem and attack it from multiple angles. In addition, he's also a great collaborator. Yes, he has great ideas, but he's able to enhance other peoples thinking as well. In addition, Gabe has the unique ability to communicate his ideas clearly and articulate. I genuinely loved working with Gabe and would highly recommend him for a Sr. leadership position.

Mark Ferrari
Owner, Mark Ferrari Specialty Coffees - KONA COFFEE!
June 28, 2014, Ian was a client of Mark’s

I am a big fan of Mark Ferrari coffee. When I learned that Mark had a home in the Valley, I invited him to an Open House at our agency. He was kind enough to accept the invitation and I had the honor of meeting the Roastmaster himself. Mark is not only extremely passionate about the coffee he makes, but he is a genuinely nice man. If you ever have the pleasure of meeting Mark, I'm sure you will feel the same way about him as I do. If you're a high end retailer, you should carry Mark Ferrari Coffee. If you are a consumer, and you haven't tried Mark Ferrari Coffee, you should do so immediately.

summary: Ian started his career at the age of 8 when he sent an ad concept to Pepsi-Cola. His idea was politely rejected, but the Marketing Manager sent him a pen and pencil set along with a note stating that "Someday a creative boy like you will be in the advertising business."That prophecy came true, as Ian worked at agencies in Atlanta, New York and Richmond before joining Cramer-Krasselt Phoenix in 2000. Along the way, he has worked on campaigns for Aetna, Arizona State Credit Union, Bahamas Ministry of Tourism, Blue Man Group, Burger King, Compaq, COX Communications, Crystal Springs, Culligan, Dial, Florida Citrus, Horseshoe Gaming, Labatt’s, MGM Grand, Molson, Monterey County CVB, Peter Piper Pizza, RA Sushi, RCA, Stanley Tools, Toyota, University of Phoenix, UPS, Wolfgang Puck, and Zicam.His work has been featured in Communication Arts, The One Show, OBIE Awards, Effie Awards and National ADDY Awards.He was named Creative Director of the Year at the 2015 Phoenix ADDY Awards.Ian has judged award shows including Communication Arts, ADDY Awards and OBIE Awards.
